title: Galaxy S8 64GB Phone w/ Tab E 32GB for VZW
description:
Today only, for qualified customers and with activation of a new 2-year contract, Verizon Wireless offers the Samsung Galaxy S8 64GB 4G LTE Android Smartphone for Verizon Wireless in several colors (Orchid Gray pictured) bundled with the 0.8-lb. Samsung Galaxy Tab E 8" 32GB 4G LTE Android Tablet for Verizon Wireless in Dark Gray for $18/month for 24 months ($432 total) with free shipping when you add each item to cart with monthly device payments. (Add both items to cart to see this price.) That's $124 under the lowest price we could find for just the phone for Verizon elsewhere. Note: You'll receive your savings as a monthly bill credit.

The water-resistant phone features a Qualcomm Snapdragon 835 2.35GHz 8-core processor, 5.8" 2960x1440 Super AMOLED touchscreen, 4GB RAM, 64GB storage, Dual Pixel 12-megapixel rear camera, 8-megapixel front-facing camera, 4K video recording, 802.11ac wireless, Bluetooth 5.0, microSD card slot, USB 3.1 Type-C, fingerprint sensor, and Android 7.0 (Nougat). The tablet features an Exynos 7570 1.4GHz quad-core processor, 8" 1280x800 touchscreen LCD, 1.5GB RAM, 32GB storage, 5-megapixel rear camera, 2-megapixel front-facing camera, WiFi, Bluetooth 4.2, microSD card slot, and Android 7.1.1 (Nougat).

title: Filson Men's Short Cruiser Jacket
description: Sierra Trading Post offers the Filson Men's Short Cruiser Jacket in Olive for $109 plus $13.95 for shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $68. It's available in sizes S to XL.

title: Green Alien 2L Hydration Backpack
description: GearXS via eBay offers the Green Alien 2-Liter Hydration Backpack in Black or Orange for $8.99 with free shipping. That's $36 off list and the lowest price we could find. It features a flexible drinking tube and adjustable elastic cord.

title: Teespring Women's Fab Fitness Leggings
description: Teespring via eBay offers the Teespring Women's Fab Fitness Leggings in several styles (Geometric pictured) for $19.99 with free shipping. That's $25 off list and the lowest price we could find. They're available in sizes XS to XL.

title: Guess Women's Drama Square Sunglasses
description: Walkintofashion via eBay offers the Guess Women's Drama Square Sunglasses in Gold/Black or Rose Gold/White for $39.19 with free shipping. That's $59 off and the lowest price we could find. They feature 60mm lenses.

title: Ralph Lauren Happy New Year Sale
description:
Ralph Lauren takes an extra 30% off select styles, already marked up to 65% off, via coupon code "2018" as part of its Happy New Year Sale. Shipping adds $5 (choose "Economy" at checkout), or spend $125 or more for free shipping via coupon code "FREESHIP125". Some exclusions apply. Deal ends January 4.

See all Ralph Lauren Coupons.

title: Carnival 7Nt Caribbean Cruise
description: Vacations to Go offers a Carnival Cruise 7-Night Caribbean Cruise for Two, with prices starting from $908. That's the lowest price we could find by $40. This roundtrip cruise aboard the Carnival Glory departs from Miami, FL, on January 27. Book this travel deal by January 26.

title: NordVPN 3-Year VPN Subscription
description: NordVPN offers its NordVPN 3-Year VPN Subscription for $99 ($2.75/month). That's tied with last week's mention, $331 off list, and the lowest price we could find. The service features AES 256-bit encryption, 2,533 worldwide servers in 56 different countries, a no-logs policy, and automatic kill switch. You can connect up to six devices simultaneously, and it's compatible with Windows, Mac, iOS, Android, and more.

title: Dell XPS Coffee Lake i5 6-Core PC w/ 2GB GPU
description:
Dell Home, via its Member Purchase Program, offers its Dell XPS 8930 Tower Intel Coffee Lake Core i5 2.8GHz 6-Core Gaming Desktop PC for $734.99. Coupon code "50OFF699" cuts that to $685.99. With free shipping, that's $114 off list, $14 below our mention from last week, and the lowest price we've seen. Deal ends February 3. Features include:
  • Intel Core i5-8400 2.8GHz Coffee Lake 6-core processor
  • 8GB RAM
  • 1TB 7200 rpm hard drive
  • AMD Radeon RX 560 2GB graphics
  • Windows 10 Home 64-bit

title: Chase Sapphire Preferred® Card
Sony PlayStation VR Gran Turismo Bundle
description: Dell Home offers the Sony PlayStation 4 VR Gran Turismo Sport Bundle for $199.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $58, although we saw it for $21 less two weeks ago. It includes the VR headset, PlayStation camera, and Gran Turismo Sport.

title: LEGO Batman Movie Alarm Clock
description: Toys"R"Us offers the LEGO Batman Movie Alarm Clock in Batgirl or Joker for $10.48. Coupon code "NEWYEARS20" cuts that to $8.38. Opt for in-store pickup where available to dodge the $5.99 shipping charge. That's the lowest price we could find for either character by at least $8 and the best deal we've seen for any Batman Movie alarm clock. (We saw it in Batman for $14 in April.) It measures 9" tall and requires two AAA batteries (included). Coupon ends January 6.

title: Ekobrew 2.0 K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter
description: Walmart offers the Ekobrew 2.0 K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter in Black for $2.34. Opt for in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping charge. That's the best price we could find by $8, and the lowest we've seen for an Ekobrew refillable K-Cup. It's dishwasher safe and compatible with Keurig and K-Cup single serve coffee brewers.

title: Allen Edmonds Men's Factory 2nd Shoes at eBay
description:
Allen Edmonds via eBay discounts a selection of its Allen Edmonds men's factory-second shoes, with deals starting at $77. (Prices are as marked.) Plus, all orders bag free shipping. Stock and sizes are limited in most styles. A couple of best bets, with comparisons to new pairs:
  • Allen Edmonds Men's Cornwallis Dress Oxfords for $117 (low by $101)
  • Allen Edmonds Men's Brooks Brothers Presidio Shoes for $149 (pictured, $150 off)
Note: These shoes may have minor cosmetic blemishes that do not affect the fit, comfort, or durability of the shoes.

title: DiscountMags Year-End Blowout Sale
description:
DiscountMags cuts prices on hundreds of magazine subscriptions during its Year-End Blowout Sale, with prices starting at $4 / year. Deal ends January 2. A couple of best bets (scroll down to see them):
  • Glamour Magazine 1-Year Subscription for $4.60 (12 issues, low by $5)
  • ESPN Magazine 1-Year Subscription for $4.62 (pictured, 26 issues, low by $14)

title: Crazy 8 Mega Sale
description:
Crazy 8 takes an extra 20% off sitewide via coupon code "NEWYEAR" as part of its Mega Sale, yielding a total savings of up to 80% off. Plus, all orders bag free shipping. That's a similar discount to the Crazy 8 Cyber Monday sale and the best sitewide coupon we've seen in the past year. (We've seen larger extra discounts, but those applied to clearance only.) Some exclusions may apply. Deal ends January 3.

See all Crazy 8 Coupons.

title: Bike Deals at Walmart
description:
Walmart discounts a selection of rollback and clearance men's, women's, and kids' bicycles. Plus, most orders receive free shipping. (Oversized bikes may incur additional handling charges.) A couple of best bets:

  • Schwinn Men's 700c Kempo Men's Bike for $208.99 (pictured, $25 off)

title: Hugo Boss Men's Aviator Sunglasses
description: Luxomo offers the Hugo Boss Men's Aviator Sunglasses in several styles (Matte Blue pictured) for $84.99. Coupon code "30LUX" drops it to $55. With free shipping, that's the lowest price we could find by $57. They feature polarized lenses. Deal ends January 5.

title: Old Navy Epic Clearance Event
description:
Today only, Old Navy takes up to 75% off clearance items as part of its Epic Clearance Event. Even better, an extra 20% off applies in-cart. Shipping adds $7, but orders of $25 or more receive free shipping via coupon code "FREESHIP". Some exclusions may apply.

See all Old Navy Coupons.

title: Bank of America® Travel Rewards Credit Card
Stanzino Women's Sherpa Lined Hooded Jacket
description: Stanzino via eBay offers the Stanzino Women's Sherpa Lined Extra Thick Hooded Jacket in several colors (Black pictured) for $18.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $5. It's available in sizes S to XL.

title: Sof Sole Men's No-Show Cushion Socks 6-Pack
description:
Deal Genius offers six pairs of Sof Sole Men's No-Show Tab Cushion Socks in Dark Grey or White for $9.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $11. They fit men's shoe sizes 8 to 12.5.

Also available are 12 pairs of Sof Sole Women's No Show Athletic Performance Socks in assorted colors for $11.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $9. They fit women's shoe sizes 5 to 10.

title: Superdry Men's Joggers
description: Superdry via eBay offers the Superdry Men's Joggers in several styles (Trackster Phoenix Grey pictured) for $29 with free shipping. That's $31 under the lowest price we could find for a similar pair of Superdry joggers elsewhere. They're available in select sizes from S to XL.

title: Masione 150ft Security Camera Cable 4-Pack

With free shipping, that's $8 off and the lowest price we could find, although we saw it for $2 less in November. Each cable has BNC connectors and includes two RCA/BNC adapters. Deal ends January 14.

title: Kindle eBooks at Amazon
description:
As one of its daily deals, Amazon takes up to 80% off a selection of Kindle eBooks, with deals starting at 99 cents. (All items are priced under $5.) Deal ends today. A couple of best bets:
  • Kelly Barnhill's The Girl Who Drank the Moon Kindle eBook for $1.99 (pictured, low by $7)
  • Marcus Sakey's Afterlife Kindle eBook for $1.99 ($8 less than paperback elsewhere)

title: Best Phone Deals: Snag an Unlocked Nokia Plus Extras for $47!
description: Snag a cheap cell phone today and start your new year off right! Score a refurb Galaxy S5, or opt for a brand-new Nokia that'll remind you of the good ol' days. Check out these offers and more in our roundup of the week's best phone deals.

title: Magellan Outdoors Women's Winter Boots
description: Academy Sports and Outdoors offers the Magellan Outdoors Women's Winter Boots in several styles (Front Zip Pac pictured) for $19.99. Pad your order over $25 to bag free shipping, otherwise shipping adds $8.01. Excluding padding, that's a savings of $10 and the best deal we could find. They're available in select sizes from 6 to 10.

title: Frontier Airlines Nationwide Winter Fares
description:
Frontier Airlines via DealBase discounts select Frontier Airlines Nationwide 1-Way Fares with fares starting from $43.30. (On the DealBase landing page, click on "Frontier Airlines" in the top line to see this sale.) That's the best price we could find for select routes today by at least $5. This price is valid on flights departing from Denver, CO, (DEN) with arrival in Portland, OR, (PDX) on January 11. Book this travel deal by January 10 for travel through March 7.

All prices, dates, and booking details were valid at the time of publication.

title: 250 4x6" or 4x4" Photo Prints w/ 16x20" Print
description:
Shutterfly offers 250 4" x 6" or 4" x 4" Photo Prints bundled with a 16" x 20" Photo Print for free via coupon code "CELEBRATE". (Coupon applies to glossy or matte prints only.) Shipping adds $31.19 if you get both items. (You don't have to buy both items; shipping adds $24.20 or $6.99, respectively, if you only get one of the items.) That's a savings of up to $80 and one of the best deals we've seen on prints from Shutterfly this year, although we briefly saw unlimited free 4" x 6" or 4" x 4" prints in September.

Shopping for other items? Coupon code "NEWYEAR" takes 50% off hardcover books and calendars or 40% off everything else. (Coupons don't stack.) Some exclusions apply. Both deals end January 3.

title: Southwest Rapid Rewards® Plus Credit Card
Macy's New Year Sale
description: Ending today, Macy's takes an extra 15% to 20% off most items sitewide via coupon code "JOY" during its New Year Sale. (Eligible items and discounts are marked.) Pad your order with a beauty item (they start at $3) to bag free shipping; otherwise, shipping adds $10.95. (Orders of $49 or more also ship free, and in-store pickup may be available.) Some exclusions apply, including Deals of the Day, Specials, and Super Buys.

title: NCL 4Nt Eastern Bahamas Cruise
description: Norwegian Cruise Line offers a Norwegian Cruise Line 4-Night Bahamas Cruise for two with prices starting from $558, as seen on Travelzoo. That's the lowest price we could find for such a cruise by $80. This roundtrip cruise aboard the Norwegian Sky departs from Miami, FL, on January 22. Additional fees and taxes apply. Book this travel deal by January 21.

title: Xbox One S 500GB, Forza Horizon 3 Hot Wheels
description:
Newegg offers the Microsoft Xbox One S Forza Horizon 3 Hot Wheels 500GB Console Bundle in White for $199.99. Coupon code "EMCPEPE52" drops it to $179.99. With free shipping, that's $12 under our mention from two weeks ago and the best price we've seen. (It's the best deal today by $19.) Deal ends January 7.

It features 4K Ultra HD video and Blu-ray support, High Dynamic Range, a streamlined wireless controller, integrated power supply, IR blaster, and vertical stand. The bundle includes downloads of Forza Horizon 3 and the Hot Wheels expansion.

title: Masione Mechanical Keyboard
description: Happy Tao via Amazon offers the Masione Mechanical Keyboard for $81.99. Coupon code "DPL4L6BJ" drops it to $49.99. With free shipping, that's $32 off and the lowest price we could find. Features include blue switches, five backlight settings, three macro LEDs, and phone cradle. Deal ends January 14.

title: Open-Box Insignia Stereo Bluetooth Soundbar
description:
Best Buy via eBay offers the open-box Insignia Stereo Bluetooth Soundbar for $27.99 with free shipping. That's $52 under list price for a new one and the best deal we've seen for this model in any condition.

Note: A 1-year warranty applies, although it's unclear who backs it.

title: Nature's Bakery Whole Wheat Fig Bar 12-Pack
description:
Amazon offers Nature's Bakery Whole Wheat Fig Bar 12-Pack in Apple Cinnamon for $4.43. Order via Subscribe & Save to cut the price to $4.21 and net free shipping. That's a buck less than our November mention and $2 under what you'd pay in-store locally for any flavor.

Note: Remember to cancel your subscription once your order ships to avoid being billed for subsequent purchases.

title: Sperry for J.Crew Men's 2-Eye Boat Shoes
description:
Today only, J.Crew offers its Sperry for J.Crew Men's Authentic Original 2-Eye Broken-In Boat Shoes in Mercury Grey for $67.99. Coupon code "HOORAY" cuts them to $33.99. With $5 for shipping, that's a savings of $64 off list price. They're available in sizes 7 to 13.

Note: These shoes are final sale and can't be returned or exchanged.

title: Banana Republic Sale
description:
Banana Republic cuts an extra 60% off sale items. (Discount applies in cart.) That's tied with last week's mention as the largest extra discount we've seen on sale items from Banana Republic since this promotion came around a year ago. Shipping adds $7, or spend $50 or more (before in-cart discount) to bag free shipping.

Have your eye on newer styles instead? Take 40% off regular-priced items via coupon code "BRFUTURE". Some exclusions may apply. Both deals end January 2.

See all Banana Republic Coupons.

title: Seagate 2TB 3.5" SATA 6Gbps Internal HDD
description: Newegg offers the Seagate Barracuda 2TB 3.5" Serial ATA 6Gb/s Internal Hard Drive for $54.99. Coupon code "18TBEST07" cuts it to $42.99. With free shipping, that's the lowest price we could find by $12, although most stores charge $65 or more. (It's a very low price for a 2TB in general.) It features a 64MB cache.

title: Dell Member Purchase Program
description: Dell Home, via its Member Purchase Program, offers discounts of up to 30% off select laptops, desktops, tablets, electronics, and accessories. Plus, free shipping applies to most items.

title: Wenger Men's Silver Dial Leather Strap Watch
description: Certified Watch Store via eBay offers the Wenger Men's Silver Dial Leather Strap Watch for $60.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $17. It features a stainless steel face, leather strap, quartz movement, and water resistance to 330 feet.

title: Alpine Swiss Men's Thermal Leather Gloves
description: Art of Deals via eBay continues to offer the Alpine Swiss Men's Dressy Thermal Lined Leather Wrist Strap Gloves in Brown or Black for $9.99 with free shipping. (Alpine Swiss via Amazon charges the same.) That's tied with last week's mention and the lowest price we could find today by $6. They're available in sizes S to XXL.

title: Women's Sherpa Non-Skid Slipper Socks 2pk
description: Deal Genius offers Women's Sherpa Lined Non-Skid Slipper Socks 2-Pack in Navy/Gray or Red/White for $9.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $15. They fit women's shoe sizes 4 to 10.

title: Used Nintendo Wii U 32GB Console
description:
GameStop offers the used Nintendo Wii U 32GB Console in Black for $129.99 plus $8.99 for shipping. That's $36 under our November refurb mention (although that came bundled with a game) and the lowest price we've seen for this console in any condition. (It's $41 below the best deal for a refurb now.) The console includes the Wii U GamePad controller and sensor bar.

Also available is the Nintendo Wii U 8GB Console in White for $109.99. Choose in-store pickup to avoid the $7.49 shipping fee. That's the best deal we could find for a used unit today by $129 and the lowest price we've seen for it in any condition.

Note: No warranty information for either item is provided; however, each item is covered by a 7-day money-back guarantee.

title: Refurb Nintendo DS Game Systems
description:
GameStop offers a selection of refurbished Nintendo DS game systems from $14.99, as listed below. Choose in-store pickup to avoid the $5.99 shipping fee. The deals:
  • Refurbished Nintendo DS Lite Game System for $14.99 ($20 off)
  • refurbished Nintendo DSi Game System for $19.99 ($20 off)
  • refurbished Nintendo DSi XL Game System for $29.99 (pictured, $20 off)
Note: No warranty info is provided.

title: Jabbawockeez "Jreamz" Ticket in Las Vegas
description: Travelzoo offers a Ticket to Jabbawockeez "Jreamz" at the MGM Grand Hotel in Las Vegas, NV, with prices starting from $49.78 plus $13.44 in taxes and service fees. That's $36 off list and the lowest price we could find. The Jabbawockeez are currently known for their recent appearance in Aziz Ansari's Master of None: Season 2, and perform most Thursdays through Mondays. Book this travel deal by February 20 for shows through December 31.

title: American Tourister 20" Spinner Case
description:
Samsonite via eBay offers the American Tourister 20" Wavebreaker Spinner Case in several colors (Summer Sky pictured) for $49.99 with free shipping. That's tied with our June mention, $110 off, and the lowest price we could find.

It's also available in a 28" size for $69.99 with free shipping.

title: Larabar 1.7-Oz. Fruit and Nut Bar 16-Pack
description:
Amazon offers the Larabar 1.7-oz. Gluten Free Bar 16-Pack in Cashew Cookie for $8.63 with free shipping via the steps below. That's $1 under last month's mention and about $5 less than you'd pay in-store locally. To get this deal:

  2. clip the $3.50 off coupon on the product page

description:
Spirit Airlines via ShermansTravel offers Spirit Airlines Roundtrip Flights to Boston, MA, with prices starting from $92.60. (On the ShermansTravel landing page, click on "Spirit.com" in the main paragraph to book.) This price is valid on flights departing from Orlando, FL, (MCO) with arrival in Boston, MA, (BOS) on January 17 with return on January 23. That's the lowest price we could find for select routes by at least $12. Book this travel deal by January 31.

All prices, dates, and booking details were valid at the time of publication.

Nunn Bush Men's Galloway Chukka Boots
description: Jet.com offers the Nunn Bush Men's Galloway Chukka Boots in Navy Suede for $42 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $6, although we saw them in another color for $3 less three weeks ago. They're available in select sizes from 7.5 to 11.

description: Brooks Brothers takes up to 40% off a selection of its men's, women's, and kids' items during its Semi-Annual Sale. Plus, take an extra 15% off in-cart. Shipping starts at $5.95. Deal ends January 2.

description:

Note: Be sure to cancel Subscribe & Save after your order ships or you'll be billed for subsequent shipments.

description: Happy Tao via Amazon offers the Masione 120-Mile HDTV Antenna for $82.99. Coupon code "DQZNKIRT" cuts it to $44.99. With free shipping, that's $18 under our August mention and the lowest price we could find by $25. It comes with 30 feet of coaxial cable. Deal ends January 14.

description:

  • Citizen Men's Navihawk A-T Eco-Drive Chronograph Watch for $358 + $0 s&h via "AD10" (pictured, low by $6; $421+ elsewhere)

title: 5Nts All-Incl. Adults-Only Costa Rica Hotel
description: Ending today, BookIt via Dunhill Travel offers 5-Night Stays for Two at the All-Inclusive Occidental Papagayo in Guanacaste, Costa Rica, with prices starting at $886 via coupon code "EOY150". (It's the top offer on the page; we found this rate on July 1.) At $177 per night, that's the lowest current rate we could find for an all-inclusive stay at this adults-only property by $150. (It's also the lowest nightly rate we've seen for this property in well over a year.) This 4-star hotel has an Expedia rating of 70% based on 540 reviews. Book this travel deal today for stays from April 1 through July 28.

title: Seatore Lemon Squeezer
description: HomeBay via Amazon offers the Seatore Lemon Squeezer for $16.99. Coupon code "KLS4A8CG" cuts it to $13.60. Plus, Prime members bag free shipping. It features a dual gear mechanism and stainless steel construction. Deal ends January 2.

title: 5 Deals You Need to Know Today: Score a Classy Suit for $55!
description: Start your week — and the new year! — off right with these awesome offers. Score a tailored-fit suit at $145 cheaper than usual, a beauty box that's essentially free, and more. Check out these and other deals in our roundup of the top five Editors' Choice deals we found last night and this morning.

title: Filson Men's Bell Bomber Jacket
description: Sierra Trading Post offers the Filson Men's Bell Bomber Jacket in Green or Black for $109 plus $13.95 for shipping. That's $216 off list and the lowest price we could find. It's available in sizes S to XL.

description:

See all J.Crew Coupons.

description:

That's the lowest price we could find by $5, although we saw it for a buck less last July. It features password protection and encryption support.

title: Romoss USB 3.0 Dual Port 36W Car Charger
description: Romoss Direct via Amazon offers the Romoss USB 3.0 Dual Port 36-watt Car Charger for $13.99. Coupon code "QCARNY18" drops it to $9.79. Plus, Prime members bag free shipping. title: Michael Kors Men's Wool Blend Peacoat
description: Nordstrom offers the Michael Kors Men's Wool Blend Double Breasted Peacoat in several colors (Heather Grey pictured) for $99.90 with free shipping. That's $250 off and the lowest price we could find. It's available in select sizes from S to 3XL.

title: Carnival 7Nt W. Caribbean Cruise

This roundtrip cruise aboard the Carnival Dream departs from New Orleans, LA, on February 4. Book this travel deal by January 31.

description: CheapCaribbean via ShermansTravel offers a Sunscape Splash Montego Bay 3-Night Flight and Hotel Package for Two in Montego Bay, Jamaica, bundled with $200 Resort Credit, with prices starting at $1,299.46. This 4-star resort has an Expedia rating of 69% based on 383 reviews. Book this travel deal by January 31 for travel from January 2 through March 23.

description: BetterBasics via Amazon offers the Smart Weigh Digital Body Weight Scale in Silver for $22.99. Coupon code "2MEASURE" cuts that to $18.39. Plus, Prime members bag free shipping. It recognizes and stores up to eight users and features a tempered glass platform, multi-color backlit LCD screen, and 440-lb. weight capacity. Deal ends January 20.

title: Wells Fargo Cash Wise Visa® Card
Cetaphil 10-oz. Eczema Calming Moisturizer
description:
Amazon offers the Cetaphil Restoraderm Eczema Calming Body Moisturizer 10-oz. Bottle for $7.40 with free shipping via the steps below. That's around $8 under what you'd expect to pay in local stores. To get this deal:

description: Deal Genius offers the DG Hill Men's Braided Belt in five colors for $4.99 with free shipping. That's $20 off and a very low price for such a belt. It comes in sizes S to XL.

title: Fallon Fabric Accent Chair
description: Costco offers its members the Fallon Fabric Accent Chair in several colors (Blue pictured) for $179.99 with free shipping. (Non-members pay a $9 surcharge.) That's $60 off and the lowest price we could find. It features a solid rubberwood frame and solid legs. Deal ends January 2.

title: Aston 10- x 7.5-Foot Wood Shed
description:
Costco offers its members the Aston 10- x 7.5-Foot Wood Shed for $999.99 with free shipping. (Non-members pay an additional $50 or get a 1-year membership for $60.) That's $400 off list and the lowest price we could find. It features 2"x4" wood framing and included floor kit. Deal ends January 2.

Note: It doesn't include paint, shingles, or front decking.

title: Lodge 10.5" Pre-Seasoned Square Grill Pan
description: Amazon offers Prime members the Lodge 10.5" Pre-Seasoned Square Grill Pan for $11.05 with free shipping. (Target charges the same with in-store pickup.) That's $2 under our mention from two weeks ago and the lowest price we've seen. (It's the best deal today by $2.) It has a ribbed bottom for low-fat cooking.

title: Baytek 110-lb. Digital Luggage Scale
description: iTech Deals offers the Baytek 110-lb. Digital Luggage Scale for $7.99. Coupon code "DNBAYTEK7" cuts the price to $6.99. With free shipping, that's $3 under the lowest price we could find for a similar scale sold elsewhere. Features include a 1.4" LCD display, temperature sensor, battery indicator, and rubber handle. Deal ends January 4.

title: Toshiba 1TB SATA 6Gbps 3.5" Internal HDD
description: For in-store pickup only, Micro Center again offers the Toshiba P300 1TB Serial ATA 6Gb/s 3.5" Internal Hard Drive for $29.99. That's tied with its Black Friday mention and the best deal we could find by $20. (It's also a very low price for a 1TB 7200 rpm HDD in general.) It runs at 7200 rpm and has a 64MB cache. Deal ends January 7.

title: Avianca Airlines Fares to South America
description:
Avianca Airlines offers Avianca Airlines Roundtrip Flights to Central and South America with prices starting from $358.03, as seen on Travelzoo. That's the lowest price we could find for select routes by at least $46. This price is valid on flights departing on January 29 from Newark, NJ, (EWR) with arrival in Guatemala City, Guatemala, (GUA) and return on February 6. Book this travel deal by January 4 for travel from January 22 through May 31.

All prices, dates, and booking details were valid at the time of publication.

title: Special K Cereal 12.5-oz. Box
description:
With orders of $25 or more, Amazon offers the Special K Fruit and Yogurt Cereal 12.5-oz. Box for $1.95. Clip the 30% off coupon to cut that price to $1.36. With free shipping, that's the lowest price we could find by $2.

Note: This item is part of Amazon's "add-on" program and can only be purchased with an order of $25 or more.

title: Chase Freedom Unlimited® Card
Batman: Return to Arkham for Xbox One
description: For Xbox Live Gold members, Microsoft Store offers downloads of Batman: Return to Arkham for Xbox One for $10. That's $5 under last month's mention and the lowest price we've seen. (It's the best today by $10.)

title: Little Nightmares for Xbox One
description:
For Xbox Live Gold members, Microsoft Store offers downloads of Little Nightmares for Xbox One for $10. That's the lowest price we could find by $10. Deal ends January 5.

Little Nightmares: The Complete Edition for Xbox One is also available for $17.99 for Xbox Live Gold members. That's the best deal we could find by $2.

title: SwissGear ScanSmart Laptop Backpack
description: Sam's Club offers its members the SwissGear ScanSmart Laptop Backpack for $34.98. (Non-members pay a $3.49 surcharge.) Opt for in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping charge. It features a shoulder phone pocket, organizer pocket, water bottle pocket, sunglasses pocket, and padded 17" laptop compartment. Deal ends January 28.

description: Proxelle via Amazon offers the Proxelle Portable Waterproof Wireless Speaker in Green for $24.99. Coupon code "67JJC5GA" cuts it to $17.49. With free shipping for Prime members, that's the lowest price we could find by $14. It features IP67 rated water proofing, 33-foot range, Bluetooth 4.0, hands free calling, and a 10-hour playtime. Deal ends April 14.

title: 8 Things to Buy in January (and 3 Things to Wait On)
description: Ready or not, 2018 is here! That means we're done with the holiday sales and on to the post-holiday sales. While you won't find everything on sale in January, some items are real bargains this time of year — like gym memberships, bedding, and hotel stays.

title: Tacklife 12V Li-Ion Cordless Drill/Driver
description: TacklifeDirect via Amazon offers the Tacklife 12-volt Lithium-Ion Cordless Drill/Driver Kit for $45.97. Coupon code "2NPHPHCG" cuts it to $39.07. With free shipping, that's $3 under our mention from last November and the lowest price we could find by $14 today. It comes with six drill bits, six driver bits, extension bit holder, charger, and carrying case. Deal ends January 4.

title: Man's Search for Meaning Kindle eBook
description: Amazon offers Viktor E. Frankl's Man's Search for Meaning Kindle eBook for $1.99. (Barnes & Noble charges the same for a Nook version.) That's $11 less than the best price we could find for a physical copy.

title: Tacklife Pocket Folding Knife
description:
TacklifeDirect via Amazon offers the Tacklife FK02 Pocket Folding Knife for $8.97. Coupon code "9Z3ZV4QV" cuts it to $4.48. With free shipping for Prime members, that's $5 off and the lowest price we could find. It measures 4.7" when closed and features a textured handle and a belt clip. Deal ends January 4.

Note: the same code as above drops the Tacklife FK04 Pocket Folding Knife to $4.98 or the Tacklife FK03 Pocket Folding Knife to $5.49, both with free shipping for Prime members.

title: Champion Sports Medicine Ball Tree
description: As one of its daily deals, Amazon offers the Champion Sports Medicine Ball Tree for $39.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $17. It holds up to five medicine balls and measures 15" x 11" x 52". Deal ends today.

title: BankAmericard® Credit Card
Alpine Swiss Men's Niko Down Jacket
description: Art of Deals via eBay offers the Alpine Swiss Men's Niko Down Jacket in Green for $24.99 with free shipping. That's tied with our mention from November and the lowest price we could find by $6 today. It's available in sizes S to XXL.

title: 8 Things That Will Be LESS Expensive in 2018
description: Gear up for 2018 shopping, because all of these products are likely to cost less this year. Get ready to shop for 4K TVs, VR headsets, used cars, and more.

title: Kobalt 19-Piece SAE Mechanic's Tool Set
description: Lowe's offers the Kobalt 19-Piece SAE Mechanic's Tool Set for $19.98. Plus, MyLowe's members bag free shipping. (Not a member? It's free to join.) That's tied with last week's mention and the lowest price we could find today by $44. It includes 16 common shallow and deep SAE sockets, a ratchet, extension, universal joint, and blow-molded case.

title: Energy & Diet Products at Amazon
description:
As one of its daily deals, Amazon cuts 30% off a selection of Energy & Diet Products, with prices starting at $11.93. (Some feature additional discounts via on-page coupons or Subscribe & Save.) Plus, Prime members bag free shipping on all orders. Deal ends today. A couple of best bets:

  • Optimum Nutrition Pre-Workout 30 Servings Tub $16.62 (pictured, low by $14)

description:

  • Lifeline Power Wheel for $37.49 (pictured, low by $2, most charge $44+)

description: Hanes cuts up to 75% off its clearance items. Plus, all orders receive free shipping. (Shipping normally adds $7.99 for all orders under $60.) Sizes and stock are limited for some items.

title: Gaiam Muse: The Brain Sensing Headband
description: Amazon offers the Gaiam Muse: The Brain Sensing Headband in Black or White for $189.99 with free shipping. (Gaiam direct charges the same.) That's tied with last week's mention as $60 off list and the lowest price we could find. It works with the Muse app (available on iOS and Android devices) to calm your mind and deliver feedback.

description:
Macy's discounts a selection of Bioworld Men's Onesies and Pajama Sets, with prices starting form $11.96. Pad your order with a beauty item (they start at $3) to bag free shipping; otherwise, shipping adds $10.95. A couple of best bets:

  • Bioworld Men's Shark Onesie Costume for $15.99 (pictured, $24 off)

description:

  • Saucony Men's Breakthru 3 Running Shoes for $44.99 (low by $20)

description: yichengjin via Amazon offers the Soufull Multi-Functional Stainless Steel Scissors for $12.88. Coupon code "black855" cuts that to $8.55. Plus, Prime members bag free shipping. Deal ends January 31.

Deal ends today.

title: Vidpro Mini LED Video Light Kit

It features IP65 water resistance, daylight balanced output, 4-step dimming, integrated lithium-ion battery, two 1/4"-20 threaded mounting holes, and a cold shoe mounting foot. Deal ends today.

description: As one of its daily deals, B&H Photo Video offers the Agloves Unisex Polar Sport Gloves for $12.99 with free shipping. That's $2 under last month's mention and the lowest price we've seen. (It's the best today by $7.) title: John Wick 4K on Blu-ray / DVD / Digital HD
description: Amazon offers Prime members John Wick 4K on Blu-ray / DVD / Digital HD for $10 with free shipping. That's $4 under last March's mention and the lowest price we could find by $4.

title: Proxelle Flat Panel 32" to 70" TV Mount

With free shipping, that's the lowest price we could find by $7. It features a 110-lb. capacity, -3° to 12° tilt, and 180° swivel. Deal ends January 14.

title: Vatos Remote Control Car
description: Vatos Toys via Amazon offers the Vatos Remote Control Car for $49.99. Coupon code "F2JE5N9O" cuts it to $24.99. With free shipping, that's a $2 drop from two weeks ago and the lowest price we could find. It features a 164-foot range, 9 mph top speed, 15 minute playing time on full charge, and 180-minute charge time. Deal ends January 10.

title: Crest Toothpaste at Walgreens
description: For its Balance Reward members, Walgreens offers a selection of Crest toothpaste from $2.99. (Not a member? It's free to join.) Clip the $2 off coupon to drop starting prices to 99 cents. Opt for in-store pickup to avoid the $5.99 shipping fee. That's $2 under what you'd pay at other retail stores. Deal ends January 27.

title: Dillard's Permanently-Reduced Items
description: Dillard's takes an extra 50% off permanently-reduced items during its New Year's Day Clearance Event. (Prices are as marked.) That's tied with our Black Friday week mention as the best extra percent-off discount we've seen from Dillard's. Shipping starts at $8.50. Choose from items such as apparel, lingerie, handbags, shoes, and home goods.

title: Verizon Fios Just Stream It Bundle
description: At Verizon, you can sign up for the Verizon Fios Just Stream It Bundle for $49.99 per month. This bundle includes Fios TV Local bundled with Fios 50/50 Mbps Internet and your choice of one premium movie channel for three months. Also, the standard setup charge is waived, a $99.99 value. Plus, switch to Fios and get out of your contract with up to a $500 credit to help cover your early termination fee.

title: Steve Madden Solid Classic Sport Backpack
description: Nordstrom Rack offers the Steve Madden Solid Classic Sport Backpack in Olive for $15.75 plus $7.95 for shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $16. It measures 17" x 11" x 5" and features dual, adjustable padded shoulder straps, front zip storage pocket, front zip around pocket, top zip stash pocket, and earphone cord eyelet.

title: Firestone Lifetime Wheel Alignment
description: Today only, Firestone Auto Care offers its Lifetime Wheel Alignment for $119.99 via this printable coupon. That's tied with last year's mention, $70 off, and the best deal we've seen for this service. This entitles you to a standard alignment service, as well as free wheel alignments for as long as you own your vehicle.

title: Unlocked Nokia 3310 3G Cell Phone Bundle
description:
Best Buy offers the Unlocked Nokia 3310 3G Cell Phone in several colors (Charcoal pictured) bundled with a Cricket Wireless Universal SIM Card Activation Kit and a Refill Card from $46.98 with free shipping via the steps below. That's the lowest price we could find by $53. This GSM phone features 2.4" 320x240 LCD display, 16MB memory, Bluetooth, 2-megapixel camera, FM radio, and microSD slot. To get this deal:
  1. Add the Unlocked Nokia 3310 3G Cell Phone to your cart for $54.99
  2. select "add to offer" for the Cricket Wireless Universal SIM Card Activation Kit for $9.99
  3. select "add to offer" for the refill card of your choice
  4. click "add to cart" at the bottom of the page
  5. at final checkout, the price will drop to a starting price of $46.98, depending on the card selected

title: Steve Madden Sale and Clearance
description:
Steve Madden cuts an extra 40% off its sale and clearance styles via coupon code "CHEERS". Shipping adds a flat $7.95. Alternatively, for orders under $20, bag free shipping via coupon code "SHIP" (Codes don't stack, but it yields a stronger discount on these orders.) Some exclusions may apply. Deal ends December 2.

See all Steve Madden Coupons.

title: Frozen Elsa Sparkling Smile 3-Piece Set
description: Walmart offers the Disney Frozen Elsa Sparkling Smile 3-Piece Set for $2.44. Opt for in-store pickup to avoid the $5.99 shipping charge. That's $2 off list and the lowest price we could find. It includes a toothbrush holder, toothbrush, and rinse cup.

description: Fry's offers the Everything Ernest: 3 Feature Films on DVD Disc for $3.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $6. It includes Ernest Goes to Camp, Ernest Goes to Jail, and Ernest Scared Stupid.

title: Chase Premier Plus Checking℠
Oakley Men's Scuderia Ferrari Sunglasses

description: Walmart offers the Klutz LEGO Make Your Own Movie Kit for $17.18. (Amazon charges Choose in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping fee. It includes six background settings, 36 LEGO elements, and an 80-page book.

description: Sound of Tri State via eBay offers the Kenwood 2-DIN Bluetooth 6.2" Touchscreen Receiver for $189.99 with free shipping. (Electronics Express via Newegg charges the same.) That's the lowest price we could find by $9. Features include a DVD/CD receiver, AM/FM tuner, iOS and Android device control, and backup camera video input.

title: Armor All 10pc Ultimate Holiday Gift Pack
description: Walmart offers the Armor All 10-Piece Ultimate Holiday Gift Pack for $19.88. Choose in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping fee. It includes wash, glass wipes, wheel and tire cleaner, cleaning wipes, original protectant, tire shine, microfiber towel, car wash sponge, Armor All Pro Secrets Booklet, wash wipes sample, and 3.5-gallon bucket.

title: Allen Edmonds Men's Cap Toe Dress Shoes
description: Allen Edmonds offers its Allen Edmonds Men's Boulevard Cap Toe Dress Shoes in several colors (Walnut pictured) for $197.50 with free shipping. That's $198 off and the lowest price we could find. They're available in sizes 7 to 15.

title: Electric Fireplace with 44" Mantle
description: Walmart offers this Electric Fireplace with 44" Mantle in Black for $129. Opt for in-store pickup to drop it to $126.73. (You can also opt for free shipping if you aren't interested in the pickup discount.) That's $20 under our mention from ten days ago and the lowest price we've seen. This 3,750-BTU fireplace is designed to heat rooms up to 325 square feet.

title: Remington Shortcut Pro Self-Haircut Kit
description: Amazon offers the Remington Shortcut Pro Self-Haircut Kit for $38.49. Clip the $10 off coupon on the product page to cut that to $28.49. With free shipping, that's tied with yesterday's expired mention as the lowest price we've seen. (It's the best deal now by $10.) This 13-piece kit includes a hand-held clipper, nine length-adjusting combs, a cleaning brush, storage/travel pouch, oil, and a charger.

title: Annie's Organic Mac & Cheese 12-Pack
description:
For Prime members only, Amazon offers the Annie's Shells and White Cheddar 6-oz. Box 12-Pack in Shells & White Cheddar for $9.29 with free shipping via the directions below. That's tied with our November mention and $3 under what you'd pay for this quantity at a local store. To get this deal:

  2. clip the $2 $3 off coupon on the product page
  3. check out via Subscribe & Save for a final price of $9.29

Update: It now includes a $3 off coupon, which drops the price to $8.29.

title: 24 Boost High Protein 8-oz. Bottles
description: Amazon offers the Boost High Protein Complete Nutritional Drink 8-oz. Bottle 24-Pack in Chocolate Sensation for $24.72. Clip the 35% off coupon to cut that to $16.07 With free shipping, that's pennies under our September mention and $8 under what you'd pay at your local warehouse club. Each bottle includes 15g of protein and 26 vitamins and minerals.

title: Latest Credit Card Offers from Chase
description: Looking for a new credit card? Check out our Chase Credit Card page which features several offers available to applicants from a wide range of credit ratings. Some notable cards include Chase Sapphire Preferred®, Chase Freedom Unlimited®, and United MileagePlus® Explorer Card.

description:
Walmart offers the 14.3-lb. Shark Rocket Professional Upright Bagless Vacuum in Purple for $95 with free shipping. That's $4 under our mention from four days ago and the best price we've seen. (It's a low today by $34.)

Features include swivel steering, an 11" cleaning path, washable HEPA filter, LED headlights, 8.2-foot hose, crevice tool with LED light, and 30-foot power cord.

title: Gaiam Evolve Balance Board
description: Amazon offers the Gaiam Evolve Balance Board for $40.49 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $40. It purports to engage muscles in the back, core, legs, and ankles while standing.

description: In select ZIP codes only, Walmart offers the Logitech Harmony Smart Control with Universal Remote for the in-cart price of $79. It drops to $58 when you choose in-store pickup. That's tied with our mention from three weeks ago as the best price we've seen this year and it's the lowest price we could find today by $21. The Harmony Smart Control works on more than 225,000 devices and features Bluetooth 3.0, a universal remote with 50 favorite channel icons, and support for Amazon's Alexa voice control. The hub also works with the Harmony app for iOS or Android.

description:

description:
Amazon offers the Keurig Krispy Kreme Doughnuts Single-Serve K-Cup Pods 72-Pack for $27.11 via the steps below. That's the lowest price we could find by $15, although we saw it for $9 less in July. To get this deal:

That's the lowest price we could find by $48. It features a native resolution of 1920x1080 (1080p), Smart Hub (with access to Netflix, Amazon Instant Video, Hulu, etc.), and two HDMI inputs.

It features a single-touch hot milk system, "clean" button for easy maintenance, automatic capsule ejection after brewing, and sliding drip tray.

title: $15 Sam's Club Gift Card
description: At Sam's Club, Dealnews readers get a $15 Sam's Club Gift Card, together with additional instant savings, when you buy a Sam's Club 1-Year Membership. Deal ends January 31.

title: AmazonBasics Cotton Washcloth 24-Pack
description: Amazon offers its AmazonBasics Cotton Washcloth 24-Pack in White for $9.99. Plus, Amazon Prime members bag free shipping. That's $4 off list and the lowest price we could find. Each towel measures 12" x 12".

With orders of $25 or more, Amazon offers the CyberPower Grounding Adapter 2-Pack for 96 cents with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $5. It lets you fit 3-prong plugs into 2-prong outlets.

Note: This item is part of Amazon's "add-on" program and can only be purchased with orders of $25 or more.

title: DC Super Hero Girls Batgirl & Vehicle Set
description: Amazon offers Prime members the DC Super Hero Girls Batgirl & Vehicle Set for $13.80 $13.62 with free shipping. That's $2 below our mention from two weeks ago, a current best by $2 (most stores charge at least $26), and the lowest price we've seen. (For further comparison, it was $18 on Black Friday.) title: Joe's New Balance End of the Year Clearance
description:
Joe's New Balance Outlet takes up to 70% off a selection of New Balance shoes, apparel, and accessories during its End of the Year Clearance Sale. (Prices are as marked.) Coupon code "DOLLARSHIP" unlocks $1 shipping, or you can spend $99 or more to receive free shipping. (Shipping normally adds $6.95 for orders under $99.) Some exclusions may apply. A couple of best bets, each with $1 for shipping via "DOLLARSHIP":
  • New Balance Men's 573 Running Shoes for $41.99 (pictured, low by $5)
  • New Balance Women's Bomber Jacket for $58 (low by $9)

title: Google Home Mini w/ $25 Walmart GC
description: For in-store pickup only, Walmart offers the Google Home Mini in Chalk or Charcoal for $29. Plus, link your Walmart account to Google and you'll receive a $25 Walmart Credit for a future order via Google Express. Assuming you use the credit, that's tied with our expired mention from three days ago as the lowest price we've seen. (It's the best deal now by $25.) The coupon will be automatically issued when your Walmart account is linked to your Google account. Limit two coupons per household. Coupon expires January 31.

title: 9 Ways to Eat Healthy on a Budget in 2018
description: Want to eat healthier and save more money in the new year? Contrary to popular belief, those two things aren't mutually exclusive. We rounded up a few tips to help you get started on your 2018 resolutions.

title: 7 New Year's Resolutions That Will Save You Money
description: Most sites will tell you to quit smoking or stop buying Starbucks every day if you want to save money in the new year. Here are seven different New Year's resolutions for you to consider, all of which will save you money in 2018.
